title: nn.functional.upsample  returns a Variable when input is a tensor
body_html:
• PyTorch or Caffe2: Pytorch
  • OS: Ubuntu14.04
  • PyTorch version: 0.3.1_post2
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): conda
  • Python version: 3.6
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: 8.0/7.0
  • GPU models and configuration: No models
  • GCC version (if compiling from source): 4.9
  • CMake version: 3.9.4
import torch
import torch.nn.functional as F
a = torch.randn(100,100)
F.upsample(a.view(1,1,100,100), (100,100), mode='bilinear')
